com.tecacet.jflat.excel
Class ExcelReader<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.tecacet.jflat.excel.ExcelReader<T>
Type Parameters:
T - 
public class ExcelReader<T>
extends java.lang.Object

Reads a flat file into a collection of beans. It uses a LineParser to parse each line into tokens and a ReaderRowMapper to convert the tokens to beans.

Author:
Dimitri Papaioannou

readAll

public java.util.List<T> readAll()
                          throws java.io.IOException
Reads the entire file into a List. Each element is a bean of type T produced by the RowMapper

Returns:
a List of String[], with each String[] representing a line of the file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if bad things happen during the read
